price: ߊ߬ ߓߘߊ߫ ߖߌ߲ߞߌ߲߫ ߞߏߘߏ߲߰ߣߍ߲ ߡߊ߬ ߟߋ߬ ߓߊ߬ ߥߟߴߊ߬ ߓߘߊ߫ ߛߘߊߒߡߊߞߊ߲߫ ߟߋ߫ ߡߌ߬ߘߊ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ߬ ߤߌߣߊߒߕߋ ߝߍ߬؟
arabic: أَطَّلَعَ ٱلۡغَيۡبَ أَمِ ٱتَّخَذَ عِندَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَهۡدٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: aṭṭalaʿa al-ghayba ami ittakhadha ʿinda al-raḥmāni ʿahdan
